meta.description: Razorpay is an all-in-one financial platform for businesses to accept, process, and disburse payments online, offering features like payment gateways for cards/UPI/wallets.
Select the resource you want to work with.

options.label: Order
options.description: Create order, fetch orders, and fetch payments for an order.

options.label: Payment Link
options.description: Create payment link, fetch payment links, and fetch a payment link by ID.

options.label: Payment
options.description: Fetch payments, fetch a payment by ID, and fetch card details for a payment.

options.label: Refund
options.description: Fetch refunds and fetch refund details by ID.

options.label: Settlement
options.description: Fetch settlements and fetch settlement details by ID.

options.label: Invoice
options.description: Fetch invoices, fetch an invoice by ID, and fetch invoices for a subscription.

options.label: Dispute
options.description: Fetch disputes and fetch a dispute details by ID.

options.description: Perform advanced or non-standard Razorpay operations.
